This was determined as described in [ 27]. The stock solution of ABTS was prepared by mixing 7 mM ABTS and 2.45 mM potassium persulfate (K 2S 2O 8) (1 : 1) and was incubated in the dark at 25°C for about 18 hours in order to release its radicals (ABTS +). The solution was diluted further by the mixture of 1 mL ABTS + with 50 ml methanol to obtain a working solution (absorbance 0.700 ± 0.0006 at 734 nm). Plant extracts and rutin standard solution of concentration (0.005 mg/mL–0.08 mg/mL) were reacted with 1 mL ABTS in a test tube and kept in dark condition for 7 minutes.
